meanings.definition: A person or thing that has the number nine in a series.
meanings.sent1: The jersey with the niner on the back was his favorite.
meanings.sent2: She was the niner in the line-up of dancers.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over all the niner toy soldiers.
meanings.sent4: His lucky charm was a niner in a sea of eights.
meanings.sent5: The niner in the countdown marked the end of the race.

meanings.definition: A member of a group or team that has nine members.
meanings.sent1: The soccer team needed one more player to be a full niner.
meanings.sent2: He was the niner in the group of friends who always made them laugh.
meanings.sent3: The niner of the band was the drummer who loved to tap on everything.
meanings.sent4: She stood out as the niner in the choir, hitting the high notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Being the niner in the committee meant he had a deciding vote.

meanings.definition: A telephone number that ends in the digit nine.
meanings.sent1: Her contact list had a special spot for the pizza place's niner.
meanings.sent2: He dialed the niner at the end of the number to reach his grandma.
meanings.sent3: The niner on speed dial was for emergencies only, but he accidentally called it while trying to order food.
meanings.sent4: The niner in the phone number seemed to bring good luck, as it always connected him to helpful people.
meanings.sent5: She memorized the niner at the end of her best friend's number for quick calls.
